projectGridLines.title: Manned and Unmanned teaming
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Manned and Unmanned Teaming (MUM-T) refers to a concept in military operations where both manned (human-operated) and unmanned (drone or autonomous system-operated) platforms work together as a cohesive team to achieve a common objective.

Skill sets: IT- C / C++, AI knowledge

Traits expectation: Students should have good logical and coding capabilities as the projects are live and we cannot teach from the scratch.

Expected learning: Contribute in development.

projectGridLines.title: Automatic Target Recognition (ATR)
projectGridLines.description:
Description: ATR refers to the process of automatically identifying and classifying objects or targets within sensor data, such as imagery or signals, without human intervention. ATR systems use algorithms, machine learning techniques, and pattern recognition methods to analyze data and detect specific objects or features of interest.

Skill sets: IT- AI/ML, computer vision

Traits expectation: Students should have good logical and coding capabilities as the projects are live and we cannot teach from the scratch.

Expected learning: Contribute in development.

projectGridLines.title: Avalanche Detector & Avalanche Reflector
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Anti-spoofing in handheld satellite phones refers to measures taken to prevent or mitigate the risks associated with spoofing attacks. Spoofing is a type of cyber attack where an attacker impersonates a legitimate user or device to gain unauthorized access to information or services, manipulate data, or disrupt communications

Skill sets: Electronics - Proficiency in embedded software/firmware development, using languages such as C/C++ and familiarity with embedded development tools and IDEs. Advantage if the student has worked on electronic hardware design, including analog and digital circuit design, PCB layout, and debugging.

Traits expectation: Students should have good logical and coding capabilities as the projects are live and we cannot teach from the scratch.

Expected learning: Contribute in development.

projectGridLines.title: Anti-spoofing for SATCOM handheld phones
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Anti-spoofing in handheld satellite phones refers to measures taken to prevent or mitigate the risks associated with spoofing attacks. Spoofing is a type of cyber attack where an attacker impersonates a legitimate user or device to gain unauthorized access to information or services, manipulate data, or disrupt communications.

Skill sets: IT/Electronics- Computer science with C++ and higher languages like lisp and Haskell. Electronics with good practical knowledge on RF circuits.

Traits expectation: Students should have good logical and coding capabilities as the projects are live and we cannot teach from the scratch.

Expected learning: Contribute in development.

projectGridLines.title: AI based Machine Translation / Neural Machine translation
projectGridLines.description:
Skill sets: Detailed knowledge of Python, Neural network and transformers

Traits expectation: Students are expected to have detailed knowledge of coding and logical ability.

Expected learning: Contribute in development.
